transArray.content: The hotel is in a very good location, opposite Metro Line 6. There is a free parking lot in the hotel. The breakfast is great and the service is very good.

Hello dear guest! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and taking your precious time to share your stay experience with us. It is our honor to have a clean and comfortable stay. The hotel is located in the Badili Automobile Park on the West Fourth Ring Road, 5 km from Haidian Metro Line 6. It only takes a five-minute walk from Luju Station. Public transportation is accessible in all directions. There are parking spaces shared with the park. There are sufficient parking spaces and convenient travel. Thank you for your support and recognition, which makes all the staff of Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel full of enthusiasm on the way forward. Have confidence and look forward to meeting you every time! I wish you all the best! Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
